ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView

Class DrawingLayer.LayerPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.DrawingLayer.LayerPath
  • Enclosing class:
    DrawingLayer

    private static class DrawingLayer.LayerPath
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for settings defining a Path with a color and current position (head). Used as a substitute for Pairs of Paths and Paints

      • LayerPath

        public LayerPath(JSONObject root)
          throws JSONException
        Creates a new layer from the given JSON. This is a convenience constructor, replacing the following:

        LayerPath layer = new LayerPath(Color.RED,0,0);<br/> layer.{@link #objectify(JSONObject)};
        Parameters:
        root - the JSON to load from
        Throws:
        JSONException

        the translated path

        public JSONObject jsonify()

        Throws:

      • objectify

        public void objectify(JSONObject root)
               throws JSONException
        Load the given JSONObject into this LayerPath. JSON should conform to the output of jsonify().
        Parameters:
        root - the JSON to load from
        Throws:
        JSONException - thrown if loaded data was not valid JSON
